activities: Alert Logic collects certain personal information from various third parties, customers and prospective customers, some of which may reside in the EU and Switzerland.  The personal information collected by Alert Logic may include first and last name, physical addresses, telephone numbers, email addresses, and preference choices related to the company’s services.  No sensitive information is collected through an individual's use of the company's web site or the product user interface(s).  Sensitive information may be included in system log and intrusion detection data provided to the company in its provision of services via the products offered.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
